title: Write!
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: In Write!, students will read about the different tools that can be used to write. The detailed photographs, high-frequency words and repetitive text support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to ask and answer questions as well as to locate details that support the main idea.
reviewWords: brush, computer, crayon, finger, marker, pen, pencil, stick, write
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word with
